name: 陳信安
objective: This course introduces engineering students the advanced mathematics in practical engineering problems, including following topics: basic engineering mathematics, the system of differential equations, Markov chain, Fourier series, partial differential equation, vector calculus, basic complex analysis and other related topics.
schedule:
1. Review of calculus and engineering mathematics
2. System of differential equations
3. Markov chain
4. Fourier series
5. Partial differential equation
6. Vector calculus
7. Complex analysis
8. Other related topics
